body: All I can say is, NICE

amazing stuff here. after doing some reddit investigations(tm) I have come to respect Mr Kitten for the work he puts in to find sauce and share it with others to fulfill their kinks. with that being said however, it's pretty disrespectful to just post your own shit saying "what you need is this".

Interesting, I have never seen a doujin where a male demon is the one being dominated (unless he gets genderbent then dominated). Also check Mr. Kittens favorite tags in his/her profile to understand what the numbers mean, mason. If you like what you see, go ahead, if not don't.
guys dont search up the codes this nigga Mr.Kitten has given, thats full of shit
